title: Da Hufa
synopsis: In order to find the unaccounted prince (voiced by Tuthammon), the guardian (voiced by the small serial kills) came to a weird and weird town, where a group of speechless peanuts lived, and they lit up every night An oil lamp of unknown origin blackened the giant peanuts floating in the sky. The guardian found the prince hiding here in the town, and met Xiaoming, who had been protecting the prince (voiced by You Wu Yueshan), and the talking peanut man Xiao Jiang (voiced by Li Lanling), and he was lured by the force of the guardian Next, the prince agreed to go back with him to inherit the throne, but was kidnapped on the way. In the process of rescuing the prince, the great guardian gradually solved the terrifying mystery hidden in this small town. At the same time, his powerful enemy was pressing hard behind him, trying to put him to death and then hurry.(translated from douban)
